channel.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
channel.description:
Yes fellas, the original secret of monkey island is is being remade! HUGE news.
[url='https://e3.gamespot.com/story/6210601/the-secret-of-monkey-island-special-edition-first-look?tag=topslot;title;4']https://e3.gamespot.com/story/6210601/the-secret-of-monkey-island-special-edition-first-look?tag=topslot;title;4[/url]
[img]https://image.com.com/gamespot/images/2009/151/reviews/960369_20090601_790screen003.jpg[/img]

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
You can play it in classic mode and get all the nostalgia of pixilated sprites, but I prefer the hand painted art myself.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
Awesome, this looks great. I like that they decided to stay with the 2D look with new graphics, 3D objects are great and all but the 2D stuff from years ago has it’s own charm.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
I played this on my friends computer a while ago, along with battletoads.

Fantastic game.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: SteveO
item.description:
I never played the original either. I was introduced to MI with the 4th one which I thought was hilarious.

This looks really interesting. I’ll definitely want to check this out when it’s released.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
intooblivion:

Never played the original imo

stfu and gtfo

item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
Well, it was definitely better than Two Thrones, though I think WW is the reason I kept saying “The Prince has become such a pussy!”

It could have been such a better game, but for the sound glitches and shameless backtracking.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Actually, I think WW is the worst of the series

Well no shit Sherlock.
Most people for whatever gay reason do, forgetting about character development, stunning atmosphere and (yes!) great soundtrack.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: ZakKa
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

WW is the shit. Two Thrones and 2008 - fail.
I’m just afraid that it will be the same story as with PoP 2008

Actually, I think WW is the worst of the series.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
In fact, when I went back and played WW and Two Thrones, I literally died when their were no colors save for gray.

WW is the shit. Two Thrones and 2008 - fail.
I’m just afraid that it will be the same story as with PoP 2008

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: ZakKa
item.description:
Wasabi:

Ah, if only they’d recreate it to the standards of Monkey Island 3… Still very interesting though. I wonder if they’ll recreate MI2 as well.

In the interview, the guy said that if this become populair, they will probably “do more”.

So we all have to buy this and not download it illegally

Read full topic

Ah, if only they’d recreate it to the standards of Monkey Island 3… Still very interesting though. I wonder if they’ll recreate MI2 as well.

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: Psyborg
item.description:
I like some of the art in the remake, but Guybrush looks like an infant with a wig that’s been run through a taffy stretcher.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: ZakKa
item.description:
I agree, POP 08 is a beautifull game.

I also like the art of this remake. Watch the video, the closeups are amazing.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
Yes, exactly like in PoP 2008. I loved the art direction in the game. In fact, when I went back and played WW and Two Thrones, I literally died when their were no colors save for gray.

Regardless, I think we can all agree that the Monkey Island series is godly either way.

Read full topic
item.source: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE

item.title: The Secret of Monkey Island REMAKE
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
I do not agree, I think it gives it a certain…flair.

Yeah, like in PoP 2008…

Read full topic
